DIY Scent Diffuser: Create a homemade scent diffuser using essential oils and a few household items like a small spray bottle, water, and a few drops of your favorite essential oils. This can be a fun and personalized way to create a pleasant scent in your living space.

Scented Candles: Make your own scented candles using soy wax, essential oils, and a wick. You can experiment with different oil combinations to create unique scents. This can be a relaxing and creative hobby.
Aromatherapy Diffuser: Use an ultrasonic aromatherapy diffuser to diffuse essential oils into the air. This can create a pleasant scent in your home and provide the added benefit of aromatherapy.

Scented Room Sprays: Create a homemade room spray using water, essential oils, and a few drops of your favorite scents. This can be a convenient way to freshen up your living space without using commercial air fresheners.
Scented Wax Melts: Make your own scented wax melts using soy wax, essential oils, and a silicone mold. This can be a fun and creative way to create custom scents for your home.
